title: Perm banned account, able to transfer lol name?
body:
Hi,

I have recently received a perma ban on my main and want to restart to show I can reform. Is there any way I can transfer the summoner name on my perma banned account to my fresh account? If so how do I do it, thanks for all the help in advance!

replies.body:
Yeap! You can get your old summoner name back. Sadly you'll have to wait through the [Summoner Name Clean Up](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751914-Summoner-Name-Clean-Up-) immunity, which will take 2 years and 6 months to end for a level 30 account.

I recommend you check the summoner name's availability [here](http://lolnamecheck.jj.ai/) for the exact amount of days remaining until the summoner name is available again.
